Today, the South is quiet with a weak 1 ft @5s ESE swell and fresh 17 mph NNE winds. Tomorrow sees a slight bump to 2 ft @5s ESE, but the wind picks up to 23 mph E, making it blown out. By the day after, conditions improve slightly with 2 ft @5s SE and lighter 7 mph ENE winds, but it remains poor overall. Best: day after.
